task_summary: Place the grasped milk box onto the table surface, release it, and retreat safely.

task_long_description.overview: A UR-style arm operates over a cluttered tabletop holding a small white milk box. The goal is to put the milk box down onto the table near other objects (cups, bottles, can) without disturbing them. The behavior moves above the placement pose, aligns, lowers until contact, opens the gripper to release, and retreats to clear the object. Timeouts and gentle contact thresholds ensure safe placement among distractors.
preconditions: Milk box is already in the gripper
Gripper can open to release object
Perception sufficient to reference the table placement pose
stepwise_plan: Verify the robot is holding the milk box
Move above the table placement pose with vertical clearance
Approach and align to the target pose on the table
Lower until contact is detected with a low force threshold
Open the gripper to release the milk box
success_criteria: Milk box stands stably on the table
Gripper released and robot retreated to a safe standoff
failure_and_recovery: If not holding the box, abort or switch to a pick subroutine
If alignment fails, re-approach and realign
If contact not detected, increase max_depth slightly then retry
If release fails, reopen gripper and gently wiggle or re-lower
task_long_description.termination: Task ends after retreat completes and the object is no longer in the gripper.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Ensure the robot is holding the milk box before placement.
Move to a pre-place pose above the table target.
Laterally refine pose and align to the placement target.
Lower the object until gentle contact with the table is detected.
Back off to a safe standoff after release.

failure_modes: Box not in gripper at start
No contact detected within max depth
recovery_strategy: Abort or switch to pick routine
Re-approach with larger clearance then realign
Increase max_depth slightly and retry lowering
Reissue open command and, if needed, re-lower briefly
assumptions: The small white carton at the right is the milk box
Placement target corresponds to a generic 'place_on_table' pose
Instruction implies the object is already grasped

expected_success_criteria: Milk box is released and upright on table
